comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is actually Little Torch Key, not "Rampod" [sic] Key (Ramrod Key).   The point of view of the aerial photo is from the northern most point of Little Torch Key looking south towards the Overseas Highway (US 1).

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
TVL1970: Thanks for your identification of Little Torch Key!

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)
